00062 void winetrickshelp::parse() {
00063     //create a Winetricks process
00064       QProcess *p = new QProcess (this);
00065     QString pargs;
00066     pargs.append(winetricks_bin);
00067 
00068 
00069    p->start(pargs);
00070 
00071    p->waitForFinished();
00072      //get output
00073    QString lang;
00074    // Getting env LANG variable
00075    lang = getenv("LANG");
00076   lang = lang.split(".").at(1);
00077  if (lang.isNull())
00078   lang = "UTF8";
00079  /* Fucking code because Kegel is MORON! */
00080   QTextCodec *codec = QTextCodec::codecForName(lang.toAscii());
00081   QString wOut = codec->toUnicode(p->readAllStandardOutput());
00082     delete p;
00083 
00084     //parse now
00085 bool isNowParse = false;
00086 QStringList strs = wOut.split("\n");
00087 QString str;
00088 
00089 foreach (str, strs){
00090     str = str.trimmed();
00091 
00092   if (str == "Apps:" || str == "Pseudopackages:"){continue;}
00093   if (str == "Packages:") {isNowParse = true;
00094   continue;
00095   }
00096   if (isNowParse) {addToList(str);}
00097 
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 }
